original_text: And he did what was right in the eyes of the Lord, according to all that his father Uzziah had done.
korean_text: 요담이 그의 아버지 웃시야의 모든 행위대로 여호와께서 보시기에 정직히 행하였으나

sentences.original_text: And he did what was right in the eyes of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 주의 보시기에 옳은 일을 행했으며

sentences.original_text: according to all that his father Uzziah had done.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지 웃시야가 행한 모든 것과 같이 하였더라
